tagline: Quantifies threats and designs proportional mitigations so you take risks with eyes open
pros: Quantitative risk assessment that replaces gut feelings with data
Pre-mortem exercises that surface risks optimism hides
Business continuity planning that actually gets tested
Risk communication that informs decisions without causing panic
cons: Thorough risk assessment takes time and can slow decision-making
Quantification requires data that may not be available for novel risks
Pessimistic framing can dampen enthusiasm for bold moves
